website_summaries.verdict: At just over three bucks per bulb, and with no significant weakness aside from the lack of dimmability, this candelabra LED is a legitimate value pick.
pros: You won't be able to dial the light down, but this non-dimmable candelabra LED from Philips offers sufficient brightness and efficiency with adequate light quality at the lowest price of any candelabra LED we tested
cons: The bulb wasn't a standout in any of our tests, and its 11,000-hour lifespan is the shortest of any of the bulbs we tested

customer_reviews.title: Short live for an LED bulb
customer_reviews.text: All three of these bulbs that I had installed in an enclosed outdoor lantern failed within 3.5 years. I had gone to LED because replacing bulbs in this lantern is difficult. I justified the extra cost for LED based on an expected lifespan of 5-10x more than incandescent bulbs. Thus, I'm disappointed that they haven't lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Delia

customer_reviews.title: Good value LED bulb for a fixture that needs a candelabra base
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these when remodeling our home and upgrading all fixtures to LED. These were purchased with our ceiling fans in mind. Our ceiling fan is a model which has a totally enclosed "globe", not the individual arms with single bulbs. The globe required 3 candelabra base bulbs and these fit the bill for a relatively low cost. They give off light in more directions than traditional "directional" LEDs which works well to prevent "spotting" on the globe surface, my only complaint is that they are not quite bright enough through the globe itself which is a semi-opaque white.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: A quality light bulb
customer_reviews.text: Quite a bright light bulb for such a tiny size. I needed a small light bulb rather unexpectedly, so I bought this pretty much at random. I'm very happy with it and I'm surprised how bright the light is compared to how small the bulb is. Perhaps the only downsides are that the "soft white" isn't really as soft as it is BRIGHT (did I mention how bright it is?), and the candle fire shape sticks a bit over the top of the lampshade, thus somewhat negating the shade's ability to filter the very bright light. Otherwise, I'm happy for this purchase I made as a... forgive the pun... shot in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Norton

customer_reviews.title: I purchased 6 of these bulbs last year and so ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 6 of these bulbs last year and so far 4 have failed. The may operate at a lower energy level but the power saving is offset by the higher cost of the bulb since they do not last any longer than an incandescent bulb. Mr Edison's product has not been economically improved based upon my experience with the subject bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Good price and good illumination.
customer_reviews.text: You may note the the cost of LED"s has come down significantly. I thought these were a good price and put them into our outside lamp posts. I leave them on all night, every night. I have three in each post and they give very good illumination. Old incandescent bulbs would normally last 2 to 3 months and with 6 bulbs, I was constantly changing them. The first of these have been in a little over 2 months and no flickers yet. Only time will tell, but I will let you know when the first bulb goes out. Hopefully you won't hear from me for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Forehunter

customer_reviews.title: Bright but get very hot
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are very bright, but for some reason they get extremely hot. I was under the impression that LEDs are supposed to run cool, but these are far from that. I am not sure if I got a bad batch or if this is common when put in a table lamp, but that is why I am only giving them three stars
customer_reviews.author: Colton

customer_reviews.title: I ordered 2 (3 packs) March of 2016 and 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 (3 packs) March of 2016 and 2 of the bulbs recently went out. The bulbs are okay other than that.. definitely not 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Recently switched to an LED household and these are great, even outshining the incandescents that were in there
customer_reviews.text: Recently switched to an LED household and these are great, even outshining the incandescents that were in there. The soft white like this is a color match to the incandescents which is nice because it is what we're used to.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Fits tea lights & as bright as 40 watt bulbs
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace my tealight bulbs. I wanted a brighter option for my night table but still use our set of beautiful glass blown flower lights & these definitely delivered everything I needed. Standard Tea lights at 15 watts are very muted... So much so that I couldn't even see in my drawer which was right next to them. These are as if I put in three 40+ watt bulbs. Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: debi1977

customer_reviews.title: Great for a light night in the hall or kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Great for a light night in the hall or kitchen. Three of these bulbs, in wall sconces, allow me to move around my home without turning on any additional lights, in the middle of the night. Great for security and energy savings.
customer_reviews.author: Wizard

customer_reviews.title: but the light coloring is better than any other LEDs I've used so far
customer_reviews.text: Bulbs are definitely bright for a 40W equivalent, but the light coloring is better than any other LEDs I've used so far. Working perfect so far and hopefully they'll last long enough for me to see the savings.
customer_reviews.author: AP_WV

customer_reviews.title: Brighter than my 60W incandescents
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs come on right away and don't hum (unlike some other LED bulbs I've bought). They're brighter than I expected; these supposedly 40W replacements are brighter than the 60W incandescents that I had been using. I ended up using just three of these LED bulbs in a fixture that previously had four 60W incandescents.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Working great
customer_reviews.text: Needed a bulb for under vent in kitchen and works great
customer_reviews.author: Auggie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement for conventional bulbs in office ceiling fan
customer_reviews.text: I was getting a lot of heat in my home office from conventional bulbs and unable to find LED replacements at local stores - so ordered from Amazon and they work perfectly. Much less heat in the office now with the lights running. Bright enough for daytime use or nighttime use.
customer_reviews.author: MAX W UNDERWOOD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Ikea paper floorlamp
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace the incandescent bulbs in my Ikea floorlamp with the square crumpled-paper lampshade. These fit the sockets, and are indistinguishable.
customer_reviews.author: J. P.

customer_reviews.title: clean, easy, safe
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to use in my children's room for night time reading. perfect amount of light. they are cool to the touch (compared to incadesant) which makes me feel more comfortable in my children's room as well. Using 2 of the 3 bulbs so far for 6 weeks without an issue.
customer_reviews.author: daddyDIY

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item delivered
customer_reviews.text: I received the wrong item. The light bulbs I received did not have to candelabra base (B11) but the standard one (E26 I think?). I bought these as replacements so I didn't open the box until the light bulb in use burned out. By then when I discovered the mistake it was way too late to return the item.
customer_reviews.author: John T. Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for ceiling fans and such
customer_reviews.text: Been using over 2 years now and no issues. Light output is great for it's size and lower power usage is a super plus. I bought many and have had no issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: T. Luggiero

customer_reviews.title: Very much brighter than the CFLs we previously had in ...
customer_reviews.text: Very much brighter than the CFLs we previously had in this fitting, at the top of a dark flight of stairs. Not sure I'd call them "soft white" though as they are very bright. Did what we wanted but would not use them where "soft" lighting was really wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. E.

customer_reviews.title: Nice bright, white light that brings out true colors without being harsh.
customer_reviews.text: These create a nice, bright, pure white light. Everything looks so much different than they did under the yellowish incandescent bulbs. The light is white, but not garish or harsh. It really brings out the true colors of things...great for doing jigsaw puzzles or painting.
customer_reviews.author: Jack HTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: We live in a development where our post lamp automatically turns on when it gets dark and stays on overnight. These bulbs will save us money and effort from replacing so often. We are very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa P.

customer_reviews.title: Works well, bright
customer_reviews.text: So far these are working out great in my kitchen chandelier/light. Oddly difficult to find in stores for a reasonable price, these worked out quite nicely. I will be ordering more to replace the rest of the lousy CFLs that take forever to warm up.
customer_reviews.author: W. Pyszczymuka

customer_reviews.title: nice warm light to replace old, incandescent bulbs
customer_reviews.text: I bought two brands of LED Candelabra bulbs. This one had a warmer glow and provided enough light for the room. So I'm buying this light bulb for a couple of other rooms it's needed in.
customer_reviews.author: Francois

customer_reviews.title: Bright and, hopefully, long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: They replaced the incandescent bulbs in lights over my kitchen counter. They are bright and I expect them to be long-lasting. Replacing the bulbs is a tedious process, and longer lasting LED bulbs will be most welcome.
customer_reviews.author: vcmjr

customer_reviews.title: Great candelabra bulbs
customer_reviews.text: So much better than similarly priced 25W bulbs from Sylvania we bought at a local big box retailer. These are instant on and disperse light much better. I've had bad luck with CFL and incandescent candelabra bulbs going out in a year or less and these are almost the same price as the CFLs.
customer_reviews.author: Cory and Kathy

customer_reviews.title: so good! They are very bright
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! They are very bright, a nice comfortable light level. Pretty happy with these so far. I will report back if any die abnormally early.
customer_reviews.author: R. Fellows

customer_reviews.title: They are plenty bright and provide great value and same energy at the same time
customer_reviews.text: I needed outdoor lights and bought these. They are plenty bright and provide great value and same energy at the same time. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Wood

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Bulbs!
customer_reviews.text: Have owned for about 3 month now. No issues with missing LEDs. The last bulbs I purchased were not the right color temperature. Whereas these bulbs throw off a much more natural warm light.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: LED are much brighter than the analog bulbs they replaced in my ceiling fan.
customer_reviews.author: T. Aldridge

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a hallway candelabra fixture. Very happy with these bulbs. True soft white color, and good light output (seems to be pretty comparable to 40W).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon user

customer_reviews.title: No problems - good light. Can't comment on longevity
customer_reviews.text: Just installed these yesterday. No problems - good light. Can't comment on longevity, but I'm definitely satisfied so far! Paid around $8 for 3 bulbs. Would probably do it again even if they don't last a year.
customer_reviews.author: hotgrease

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Oh love these!!! Needed special LED bulbs for new house.. this fit the bill (haha)
customer_reviews.author: sussie458

customer_reviews.title: Works great..
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't find these in our stores anywhere. I am very pleased with the light they put out. So far not a one has give me trouble. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: LED light bulbs are much better than the old kind.....and they don't get hot!!!
customer_reviews.text: We are trying to find LED bulbs for everything in our house. This was one of our 1st purchases!!
customer_reviews.author: Delo

customer_reviews.title: Lightbulbs-- only 2 working
customer_reviews.text: Like the bulbs. However only 2 work. Thought with Phillips brand I wouldn't have a problem. I got te 3 set , so now my fan has only 2 lights would be nice if you could send me a replacement bulb
customer_reviews.author: D cook

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Color quality and brightness seem good after only a few weeks use. These bulbs seemed good, so I ordered another pack. Time will tell whether they have have good longevity.
customer_reviews.author: MA from PA

customer_reviews.title: They provide good light and are a great option for this form ...
customer_reviews.text: Use these outside. They provide good light and are a great option for this form factor.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Clear and eyeball easy.
customer_reviews.text: They emit a clear white light... excellent as a bed or reading lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Harry KG5JX

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what happened
customer_reviews.text: Bought them to go in an over head light that I've been using for years. About the third time I turned that light on one of them flashed/popped and burnt out. I replaced all three.
customer_reviews.author: RHB

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Bulb
customer_reviews.text: I use this outside in a yard light. Super bright using only a 40 watt bulb. Weather has been severe and the bulb is holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Galt

customer_reviews.title: Good light, do not need to warm up for full brightness
customer_reviews.text: Fit my ceiling fan perfectly. Produce a good amount of light and they do illuminate to full lumens immediately. I plan to continue to replace incandescent & CFL bulbs with these.
customer_reviews.author: C. J. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect for reading in poorly-lit office space and produces very little heat
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: This is only about half as bright as the 40 ...
customer_reviews.text: This is only about half as bright as the 40 bulbs I replaced. And it is not soft white - the light is bluish. Research thoroughly if your base is 11 or 12 mm. If 12 you will need the 12 to 11 mm adapter
customer_reviews.author: Kindginnyle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look good but a better deal at Home Depot.
customer_reviews.text: The lights look good and all worked right out of the box. Home Depot beats this price by $4.00 on a set of 3.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, fair price.
customer_reviews.text: Meets expectations, installed in ceiling fan and so far are working great.
customer_reviews.author: Hud

customer_reviews.title: Like! Good color quality and more illumination than expected ...
customer_reviews.text: Like! Good color quality and more illumination than expected per light. About 2 months and no failures.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Good looking bulb!
customer_reviews.text: One of the better bulbs I purchased for our chandelier so far. I'm not sure how long it'll last compared to the other bulbs though. Too early to tell. I moved bulbs around to let this one show more.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Wong

customer_reviews.title: Its a light
customer_reviews.text: its a light LOL. cheaper on electricity then other lights. I also like the color.
customer_reviews.author: Empiror22

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Arrived on time, works perfect and more than meets my expectation. Five star!!!
customer_reviews.author: RDF

customer_reviews.title: but only got 5 good bulbs.
customer_reviews.text: I would have rated them as 5 but 1 of my 6 bulbs was dead right out of the box. I paid for 6, but only got 5 good bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: IPLsux

customer_reviews.title: A bit dim
customer_reviews.text: A little dimmer than I expected. Should have ordered the 60 w equivalent as these are a bit dim in my Hunter Ceiling fan
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice lights. All arrived unbroken and packaged nicely
customer_reviews.text: Very Nice lights. All arrived unbroken and packaged nicely. Glow is very pretty. Perfect for night light lamp. Will purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Chief1646

customer_reviews.title: Good color
customer_reviews.text: These work great in my ceiling fan that has a globe cover, and they have a normal color to them similar to an incadescent bulb would have.
customer_reviews.author: D. Welch

customer_reviews.title: Much better than the bulbs which came with my ceiling fan
customer_reviews.text: Very bright lights. Much better than the bulbs which came with my ceiling fan. I hope these last a couple of years as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: pat

customer_reviews.title: Nice and bright
customer_reviews.text: Nice and bright. You know how the high-watt candelabra lamps don't last long. I expect this lamp to last a long long time.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are brighter than regular 40 watt bulbs and give out a lot more light, would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Hiene Junge

customer_reviews.title: Great Bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Doesn't make shadows like older or the first generations of these type bulbs. You actually can't tell at all these are LED.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda L. Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These work great for the hanging lamp in my dining room.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Branson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Oh geez is there another Sun in my room? No I just changed the bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: tacticness

customer_reviews.title: Great, if all bulbs work.
customer_reviews.text: 1 out of the 3 bulbs did not work properly. Bulb would blink on the off repeatedly. Other 2 worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Billyb

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Factory sealed package of three Phillips brand bulbs. They are amazingly bright for 40 Watt equivalent.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Calimari

customer_reviews.title: no issues :)
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Went with these as Philips is name brand and trusted. Been using for several months with no issues. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Big brother

customer_reviews.title: Easy screw in replacement for the old-fashioned incandescent light bulb
customer_reviews.text: Easy screw in replacement for the old-fashioned incandescent light bulb. Very pleased with the brightness as well as the color.

customer_reviews.title: Small Size. Perfect for Ceiling Fans with Small Enclosure
customer_reviews.text: Great fit for ceiling fans that have small enclosures. Brighter than the light that came with the fan.
customer_reviews.author: fightingmink

customer_reviews.title: George60
customer_reviews.text: Came as described. Very good light at low cost. Perfect for our porch. The light is much better then the CFL's.
customer_reviews.author: George1914

customer_reviews.title: Very bright...look good
customer_reviews.text: These LEDs are great: nice form factor and very bright with even distribution of light.
customer_reviews.author: Ric C

customer_reviews.title: not very bright at all
customer_reviews.text: they are not as bright as the seller claims they are
customer_reviews.author: daniel nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great light bulbs.
customer_reviews.text: Great light bulbs for my entry way. Bright and true to color.
customer_reviews.author: ADCinTX

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for my compact fluorescent bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement for my compact fluorescent bulbs. No warmup time for the LED. Good color temperature too. Looks like a 60watt indecent
customer_reviews.author: Rudgers

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Didn't expect the "shading" of the top half of bulb.....but it's okay.
customer_reviews.author: dyna

customer_reviews.title: Great bulbs!
customer_reviews.text: Great LED bulbs for my ceiling fan. They look and shine great in my bedroom. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: T.F.

customer_reviews.title: Low quality led bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Horrible quality. I bought a six back bulbs. The first one started flickering after a month and then went dead. With in 6 months all went dead. It's not like I have these light on 24/7. Used it for kitchen. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: works great, good size
customer_reviews.text: stuck them in a chandelier above the staircase that's a pain to change. hopefully won't have to change them again for a long time. will be getting more for the house as other old bulbs die
customer_reviews.author: Homer H.

customer_reviews.title: Love it, I myself could not make out the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it, I myself could not make out the difference between this one, and the old incandescent one myself, so go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Niladri Sekhar De

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are bright but the light doesn't seem to travel.
customer_reviews.author: D. R

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for one of my chandeliers. Nice and bright.
customer_reviews.author: Angella Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for our small bedside lamps. Left one on for 2wks straight and is still running.
customer_reviews.author: Christi Marie

customer_reviews.title: nice warm light - replaced 3 40w bulbs with 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: nice warm light - replaced 3 40w bulbs with 3 of these LED type @ 4.5W each to achieve an 88% reduction in energy consumption as well as a small reduction in summer heat load.
customer_reviews.author: Jh

customer_reviews.title: ... light post and they work as well if not better than the incandescent bulbs they
customer_reviews.text: I installed these bulbs in our walkway light post and they work as well if not better than the incandescent bulbs they replaced
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: I like the bulbs
customer_reviews.text: I like the bulbs, but I found that I wished I had bought them at Home Depot. It was the same thing only cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Farrah Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: Nice and bright
customer_reviews.text: The light is nice and bright. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: V. Pierre

customer_reviews.title: Three times better
customer_reviews.text: I like their energy economy, their expected life and how they look...way better looking than the CFLs they replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Woda

customer_reviews.title: Hoping they have a long useful life.
customer_reviews.text: They work as advertised. Hoping they have a long useful life.
customer_reviews.author: Tsing

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: changed all my lights over to led. we will see
customer_reviews.author: tom wisnieski

customer_reviews.title: Read the fine print
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased these for an outside post light. Only was able to get 2 years out of CFL bulbs so I thought Id try LEDs. Look Great and are brighter. After reading the package the life expectancy is 10 years based on 3 hours use a day, my light burns 10-12 hours per day so at the most they will last 3 years. It would be nice if all manufacturers listed hours and would not try to hide details
customer_reviews.author: J. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Nice price too
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Strong warm light. Nice price too.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Dover

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Our bathroom bulbs seem to burn out all the time and I don't like CFLs (they seem to give me a migrane and I've read they can catch fire!). I had never tried LED bulbs before, but these were the right size and a good price so I decided to get it a try. They fit perfectly in our bathroom fixture and look very nice. They give off the perfect light for a bathroom. I can't say if they'll last 10 years, but here's to hoping!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Two of the three bulbs I purchased lasted 7 months. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Segacyclist

customer_reviews.title: If you don't want a bright bulb, these are for you.
customer_reviews.text: We are replacing our energy efficient bulbs with LEDS, and since our ceiling fans require these bulbs, we gave these a shot. Good bulbs, but not near as bright as I expected them to be. We will find others to replace them, since I was wanting a much brighter bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani E.

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy If Using In Ceiling Fan for Bedroom
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was doing a good thing by switching to LED bulbs when I purchased these for the ceiling fan in my bedroom. I need the fan to sleep which means I cannot cut it off at the light switch. Well, these bulbs appear to be so effecient that even when I have turned off the light function on my fan remote, the bulbs are still lit. It's a dimmer glow for sure, but enough to disturb sleep. Will be replacing with regular lights. Maybe I can use these in another room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and bright
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says on the tin. Nice and bright and if they last ten years, it'll be quite the deal compared to the incandescent bulbs I went through. Edit: the lights remain on--but dimmed--when the ceiling fan is on and the lights are set to off. Slightly annoying and will cost the rating a star.
customer_reviews.author: Bagman

customer_reviews.title: The angle and brightness of the bulbs is better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: The angle and brightness of the bulbs is better than I expected. Just waiting to see if the last as claimed by manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Abbas M.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: The first time I ordered these bulbs one of the bulbs was not working. So I return the package back to Amazon and got a refund. In the meantime I ordered another set of these bulbs and once I got them they seemed to work okay. Within about an hour one of the bulb's burnt out. It seems when the bulb heats up it goes out. Because the next day it turns on again only for an hour then goes back out again. For only $10 for the whole 3 pack I'm not going through the whole return process again. I will not be ordering these bulbs again. Very poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: 1 out of 3 bulbs quit working on the first ...
customer_reviews.text: 1 out of 3 bulbs quit working on the first hour of use. We will see how the rest hold up. Disappointing....
customer_reviews.author: Patrick H.

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Got so tired of changing those old incadesent bulbs. These should last a long time .
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work well with remotes
customer_reviews.text: Dont buy this brand. Bulbs stay on like a night light brightness when the ceiling fan light is turned off with the remote. Completely off when you turn off the wall switch I thought I might have a problem with the fan. So I got another manufacturer product from a local home improvement store, its the stores brand too. Not the orange box but the blue one. Works just fine with the other. Fan and light work as well as it always has over the last 4 years it's been up.
customer_reviews.author: William Dills

customer_reviews.title: Weak...
customer_reviews.text: Very weak...I guess it should be used for..I'm not sure. My nightlight bulb is brighter than the three of these combined.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just ok.. Just a regular one
customer_reviews.text: It is kinda yellowish not white light. And it blinks for about 40-50 secs till it warms up every time you turn it on
customer_reviews.author: MaylandRora
